name: Dong Ngac Cultural Village with bike - Half Day tour
description:
This tour help you feel the different feeling of Viet Nam in ancient village near Ha Noi. You will witness life in peace in a quiet village and experience a typical day of Vietnamese people as the used to be in the past. This is special and unique activities for you:
- Shopping in the market in Dong Ngac village.
- Visiting an ancient house.
- Cycling on the brick roads around the village with the traditional bike of Viet Nam.
- Visiting Dong Ngac Communal house of village, comprehending the history, the architecture and the traditional culture of Viet Nam through Communal house of Village.
- Joining an English class of primary students in Dong Ngac primary school and have some funny time with them.
- Taking part in cooking a traditional lunch and enjoy the meals with local family.
- Chatting with the members in the family about their house and their big family.
